readBook.title: Read A Book
readBook.description: Grab your favorite book and a blanket and simply unwind.

netflix.title: Binge Watch Netflix
netflix.description: It's only a binge if you watch more than six episodes at a time.

nap.title: Take A Nap
nap.description: A short 20-30 minute nap can make you feel refreshed and more alert.

candle.title: Light A Candle
candle.description: But don't let burn for too long. Try a cozy scent like vanilla.

color.title: Color
color.description: Be intricate. Or not. Color inside the lines. Or not.

boardGame.title: Play A Board Game
boardGame.description: But not monopoly. That game destroys families.

staycation.title: Plan A Staycation
staycation.description: Be a tourist in your own town. Try a new restaruant or walk around a park.

unplug.title: Unplug From Technology
unplug.description: Resist the urge to keep checking Facebook or email.

tea.title: Have A Cup of Tea
tea.description: Or Coffee. Whichever you like more.

hike.title: Go On A Hike
hike.description: A short mile hike still counts. Be sure to take water.

gratitude.title: Write What You're Thankful For
gratitude.description: Reflect on the good things in your life.

flowers.title: Buy A Bouquet Of Flowers
flowers.description: The fancy flowers. None of those cheap daisies.

sun.title: Soak Up The Sun
sun.description: Take a walk in the sunshine.

ride.title: Go For A Joy Ride
ride.description: Drive to simply drive. Get lost.
